trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to a user event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um local qualificado para atividade que corresponde a um evento de usuário no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer or a workflow designer may use any of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de atividade ou um designer de fluxo de trabalho pode usar qualquer um dos sobrecarregados <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> métodos para instrumentar o fluxo de trabalho para emitir os dados para o infraestrutura como um evento de usuário de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados emitidos são referidos como dados de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on activity or workflow status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário dos eventos de status de atividade e eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho, que ocorrem apenas em atividade ou alterações de status do fluxo de trabalho, os eventos de usuário podem ocorrer em qualquer local que é instrumentada em um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying the type of the user data, the type of the activity from which it must be emitted, a collection of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of this activity, an optional key name with which the user data must be associated, whether derived types of the user data should be matched, and whether user data emitted from activities derived from the type of the specified activity should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> define os parâmetros correspondentes para tal um local especificando o tipo dos dados de usuário, o tipo da atividade do qual ele deve ser emitido, uma coleção de condições que mais precisamente pode qualificar uma instância ou instâncias dessa atividade, um nome de chave opcional com a qual os dados de usuário devem ser associados, se tipos derivados dos dados do usuário devem ser correspondidos , e se os dados de usuário emitidos de atividades derivadas do tipo da atividade especificada devem ser correspondidos.

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um único <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> podem se referir a mais de um local real no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You may add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> como <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para definir os parâmetros de correspondência para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> em um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.

trans-unit.source: There are three general conditions which must be met in the following order for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure: the activity that has emitted a user event must match the set of activities specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; the key, if one exists, associated with the user data must match <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; and, the type of the user data emitted by the user event must match the set of user data types specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Há três condições gerais que devem ser atendidas na seguinte ordem para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> para correspondência com a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução: a atividade que foi emitido um evento de usuário deve corresponder ao conjunto de atividades especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; a chave, se houver, associado ao usuário dados devem corresponder <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; e, o tipo de dados do usuário emitidos pelo evento de usuário deve corresponder ao conjunto de tipos de dados do usuário especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> , <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Only if all three of these conditions are met, does the runtime tracking infrastructure consider the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> matched.
trans-unit.target: Somente se todos os três das seguintes condições forem atendidos, a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução considera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: To configure a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>, you must set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched and either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>, você deve definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> para especificar o tipo de dados de usuário a ser correspondido e o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> para especificar o tipo da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos para ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more completely qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> para qualificar completamente mais a atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A> to specify that user data derived from the user data type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> should be matched, and you may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> to specify that user data emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A> para especificar que dados de usuário é derivado do tipo de dados de usuário especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> devem ser correspondido, e você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> para especificar os dados do usuário emitidos de atividades derivadas do tipo de atividade especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> devem corresponder.

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> to specify that only user data associated with the specified key name should be matched for this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> para especificar que o usuário somente os dados associados com o nome da chave especificado devem corresponder para este <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the runtime tracking structure will not try to match the key associated with the user data.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> é uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), o estrutura de controle de tempo de execução não tenta corresponder a chave associada com os dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: You must specify both the type of the user data to match and the type of the activity from which it must be emitted in order to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o tipo de dados de usuário para corresponder e o tipo de atividade do qual ele deve ser emitido para corresponder.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> you must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of an activity from which user data must be emitted to be matched, and you must also explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, para configurar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> você deve definir explicitamente um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> especificar o tipo de uma atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos para ser correspondido, e você deve explicitamente definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> para especificar o tipo de dados de usuário a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You may further configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode configurar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> definindo suas outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR dos dados de usuário com os quais a correspondência será feita.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> usando o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) dos dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> que correspondem aos dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido a partir do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched for `argumentTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type> dos dados do usuário a ser correspondido para `argumentTypeName`.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir explicitamente um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> em seu código para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> definindo suas outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dos dados do usuário com os quais a correspondência será feita.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> class using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> usando o tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) dos dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> que correspondem aos dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido a partir do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir explicitamente um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> em seu código para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> definindo suas outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR dos dados de usuário com os quais a correspondência será feita.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR da atividade da qual os dados de usuário deverão ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> usando o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) dos dados de usuário e o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR da atividade da qual os dados do usuário deverão ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> que corresponde a todos os dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido de atividades do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity and of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type> da atividade e os dados de usuário.

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type> de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividade for "Código".

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> definindo suas outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR dos dados de usuário com os quais a correspondência será feita.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da atividade da qual os dados de usuário deverão ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> usando o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) dos dados de usuário e o tipo CLR da atividade da qual os dados do usuário deverão ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> que corresponde a todos os dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido de atividades do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type> dos dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> definindo suas outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dos dados do usuário com os quais a correspondência será feita.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR da atividade da qual os dados de usuário deverão ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> usando o tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) dos dados de usuário e o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR da atividade da qual os dados do usuário deverão ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> que corresponde a todos os dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido de atividades do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type> da atividade.

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type> de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividade for "Código".

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> definindo suas outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dos dados do usuário com os quais a correspondência será feita.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da atividade da qual os dados de usuário deverão ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> usando o tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) dos dados de usuário e o tipo CLR da atividade da qual os dados do usuário deverão ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> que corresponde a todos os dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido de atividades do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> definindo suas outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) da atividade da qual os dados de usuário deverão ser emitidos para serem rastreados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da atividade do qual os dados devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the activity in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser especificar o tipo de atividade de maneira independente de versão, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) da atividade da qual os dados de usuário deverão ser emitidos para serem rastreados.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da atividade do qual os dados devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo da atividade.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity, set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "Code".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para especificar o nome não qualificado de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> de conjunto de atividades, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> "Código".

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> provides a much easier way to specify the type of the activity that emits the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> Fornece uma maneira mais fácil para especificar o tipo da atividade que emite os dados de usuário quando você cria um perfil diretamente no XML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> também fornece uma forma independente de versão de referência para o tipo de atividade.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) dos dados de usuário a serem rastreados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dos dados do usuário a ser rastreada.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the user data in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser especificar o tipo de dados do usuário de maneira independente de versão, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) dos dados de usuário a serem rastreados.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dos dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> provides a much easier way to specify the type of the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> Fornece uma maneira muito mais fácil para especificar o tipo de dados do usuário quando você cria um perfil diretamente no XML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> também fornece uma forma independente de versão de referência para o tipo de dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de condições que são usadas para qualificar a atividade da qual os dados de usuário deverão ser emitidos para serem rastreados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection" /> that is used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection" /> que é usado para qualificar a atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more precisely define the instance of the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> from which the user event must be emitted to match the tracking location.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> mais precisamente, defina a instância do tipo de atividade especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> do qual o evento de usuário deve ser emitido para corresponder à localidade de controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "Code" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> that specifies that the ID property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você deseja corresponder somente <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividades com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> igual a "MyCode", você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> "Código" e adicione um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> que especifica que a propriedade de ID da instância de atividade deve ser igual a "MyCode".

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> must be true for the activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> devem ser verdadeiras para a atividade a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the name with which the user data must be associated for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome com o qual os dados de usuário devem ser associados para que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> seja correspondido.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> key with which the user data must be associated for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> to be matched or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="string" /> chave com a qual os dados de usuário devem estar associados para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> a ser correspondido ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: An activity designer or a workflow designer can use either <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> to associate a string key with the user data that is emitted in a user event.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de atividade ou um designer de fluxo de trabalho pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> para associar uma chave de cadeia de caracteres com os dados de usuário que são emitidos em um evento de usuário.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the key associated with the user data must match the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> não é uma referência nula (`Nothing`), a chave associada com os dados do usuário deve corresponder ao valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`), the runtime tracking infrastructure does not check for a matching key to determine whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> is matched.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> é uma referência nula (`Nothing`), o controle de tempo de execução infraestrutura não verifica se uma chave correspondente determinar se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> for correspondida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType" /> or <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados de usuário deverão ser rastreados quando forem emitidos de atividades derivadas do tipo de atividade especificado por <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the type specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType" /> or <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os dados de usuário devem ser controlados quando ele é emitido de atividades derivadas do tipo especificado pelo <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The User tracking location is a way to filter user tracked data.
trans-unit.target: O local de acompanhamento do usuário é uma maneira de filtrar dados rastreados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The user can filter by the type of the user tracked data by specifying the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType" /> or <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName" />.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode filtrar segundo o tipo dos dados rastreados especificando o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <see langword="MatchDerivedArgumentTypes" /> to <see langword="true" /> specifies that the user tracked data can be of type ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName or a type derived from the ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <see langword="MatchDerivedArgumentTypes" /> como <see langword="true" /> especifica que os dados controlados pelo usuário podem ser do tipo ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName ou de um tipo derivado de ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if user data derived from the type of the user data specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType" /> or <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName" /> should be tracked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os dados de usuário é derivado do tipo dos dados do usuário especificados por <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName" /> devem ser controladas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.
